person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night.
animal_say: It sounds like you could use a little relaxation! I know a bear named Bruno who can help you unwind and find some peace. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some help to unwind and find peace.
animal_say: Perfect! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness specialist bear, ready to help you relax and find tranquility. Enjoy your time with him!
